meanings.definition: Not fading or losing brightness or color over time.
meanings.sent1: The unfading flowers in the garden stayed vibrant all year long.
meanings.sent2: The painting's unfading colors continued to shine even after many years.
meanings.sent3: The unfading sunset painted the sky with everlasting beauty.
meanings.sent4: Her unfading smile lit up the room like a beacon of joy.
meanings.sent5: The unfading memories of childhood brought warmth to her heart.

meanings.sent1: His unfading loyalty to his friends never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The unfading bond between the siblings grew stronger with each passing year.
meanings.sent3: The unfading commitment to excellence drove her to achieve great things.
meanings.sent4: The unfading love between them was a source of strength in tough times.
meanings.sent5: His unfading determination inspired others to never give up.
